name: Hungry Bee
description:
The Hungry Bee is about the journey of a bee throughout the seasons such as Spring, Summer, Autumn,  and  Winter. The player must help them feed their hunger around multiple obstacles. Make the bee happy by reaching the big fruit pile! Remember to take in the beauty of nature as you play!

Game Play:

-Make sure to avoid water, the bees greatest weakness

Features include:

-Wall Jumping/Climbing

-Jumping

All Assets are Free to use from the Unity asset store

Banner art is original content!
